A

AbstractContent - Class in chat.common
This abstract class is the root of the message contents used in the client or the server.
AbstractContent() - Constructor for class chat.common.AbstractContent
 
AbstractState - Class in chat.common
This abstract class defines the type for a state of a client or a server.
AbstractState() - Constructor for class chat.common.AbstractState
 
acceptNewClient(ServerSocketChannel) - Method in class chat.server.Server
accepts connection (socket level), creates MsgWorker, and registers selection key of the local client.
acceptNewServer(ServerSocketChannel) - Method in class chat.server.Server
accepts connection (socket level), creates MsgWorker, and registers selection key of the remote server.
Action - Interface in chat.common
This interface defines the interface of the actions of the algorithms of the client or the server.
Actions - Class in chat.client.algorithms.chat
This class defines the methods implementing the reaction of the state machine part concerning the reception of chat messages.
ACTIONS - Static variable in enum chat.client.algorithms.chat.Algorithm
collection of the actions of this algorithm enumerator of the client.
Actions - Class in chat.server.algorithms.election
This class defines the methods implementing the reaction of the state machine part concerning the reception of election messages.
ACTIONS - Static variable in enum chat.server.algorithms.election.Algorithm
collection of the actions of this algorithm enumerator of the server.
addServer(String, int) - Method in class chat.server.Server
connects socket, creates MsgWorker, and registers selection key of the remote server.
Algorithm - Enum in chat.client.algorithms.chat
This Enumeration type declares the algorithm of the chat part of the client's state machine.
Algorithm - Enum in chat.server.algorithms.election
This Enumeration type declares the algorithm of the election part of the server's state machine.
allClientWorkers - Variable in class chat.server.State
selection keys of the client message workers.
allServerWorkers - Variable in class chat.server.State
selection keys of the server message workers.

Client - Class in chat.client
This class contains the logic of a client of the chat application.
Client(String, int) - Constructor for class chat.client.Client
constructs a client with a connection to the chat server.
clientSeqNumbers - Variable in class chat.server.State
one counter per client in order to control the propagation of client messages: stop forward to remote servers when the message has already been forwarded ; the counter is set by the server receiving the message from the client.
clone() - Method in class chat.common.VectorClock

currKey - Variable in class chat.server.State

execute(State, int, Object) - Static method in enum chat.client.algorithms.ListOfAlgorithms
searches for the action to execute in the collection of algorithms of the algorithm of the client, each algorithm having a collection of actions.
execute(AbstractState, AbstractContent) - Method in interface chat.common.Action
executes the algorithmic part corresponding to this action.
execute(State, int, Object) - Static method in enum chat.server.algorithms.ListOfAlgorithms
searches for the action to execute in the collection of actions of the algorithm of the server.
executeOrIntercept(AbstractState, AbstractContent) - Method in interface chat.common.Action
executes the action due to the receipt of the message msg or intercepts the call of the action for instance to eventually re-schedule the receipt of the message so that some non-determinism is introduced.

isPrecededByAndFIFO(VectorClock, int) - Method in class chat.common.VectorClock
states whether this vector is clock is preceded by the vector clock provided in the argument other, except for the entry sender, for which the corresponding value in this vector clock is the next one to be received (compared to other).

S

Scenario - Class in chat.common
This abstract class defines the way integration tests can be written for instanciating several clients and several servers in the same virtual machine and for executing a sequence of actions in response to user inputs (e.g. chat message on clients or command lines on servers) and to messages received from the network.
Scenario() - Constructor for class chat.common.Scenario
constructs a scenario, that is initialize the data structures.
sendMsg(int, int, int, Serializable) - Method in class chat.common.FullDuplexMsgWorker
sends a message using channel.
sendToAllServers(int, int, int, Serializable) - Method in class chat.server.Server
sends a message to all the remote servers / neighbours connected to this server.
sendToAllServersExceptOne(SelectionKey, int, int, int, Serializable) - Method in class chat.server.Server
sends a message to all the remote servers / neighbours connected to this server, except one.
sendToAServer(SelectionKey, int, int, int, Serializable) - Method in class chat.server.Server
sends a message to a particular remote server / neighbour.
seqNumber - Variable in class chat.server.State
seqNumber is equal to the maximum of counters of clientSeqNumbers set.
Server - Class in chat.server
This class defines server object.
Server(String[]) - Constructor for class chat.server.Server
initialises the collection attributes and the state of the server, and creates the channels that are accepting connections from clients and servers.
setEntry(Integer, int) - Method in class chat.common.VectorClock
sets the value (integer) of the clock of the process (integer key).
sleep(long) - Method in class chat.common.Scenario
is a utility method to encapsulate Thread.sleep with an log message in case of an InterruptedException is thrown.
startThreadReadMessagesFromNetwork() - Method in class chat.client.Client
starts the thread that is responible for reading messages from the server.
startThreadReadMessagesFromNetwork() - Method in class chat.server.Server
starts the thread that is responible for reading messages from the clients and the other servers.
